title: Forever Ours
description: Fireworks, a romantic setting, a silver ring, and an ex-boyfriend...   It's New Years and Sophia wants to declare her love for Jason in a big way. Although she's ready to take the next step and start New Years off with a bang, her plans get derailed as someone from her past re-enters the picture, stirring up old memories which Sophia just can't shake...   WARNING! This story ends on a cliffhanger.    Note: This is the eighth instalment of the Billionaire Next Door series. Although each story can be read individually, the series makes more sense if read in sequence.   The other instalments of the Billionaire Next Door are: All Yours (Book 1) For You (Book 2) My Love (Book 3) Just Us (Book 4) With Me (Book 5) You and I (Book 6) All of Me (Book 7) Forever Ours (Book 8) The One (Book 9)  **This 10k+ word new adult erotic romance contains strong language and explicit scenes, including steamy hot sex between two characters. Adult readers only!***  keywords: new adult contemporary romance, romantic comedy, m/f, new adult sex
author: Violette Paradis
